name: czkawka
tagline: A fast tool for finding duplicate files and cleaning disk space
description: Czkawka is a fast, cross-platform tool for finding duplicate files, similar photos, empty folders, and more. It features a CLI and GUI and is designed for efficiency using Rust and multithreading support.

features.title: Duplicate Detection
features.description: Find identical files quickly and accurately. Reclaim wasted storage

features.title: Similar Photos
features.description: Identify near-duplicate images intelligently. Clean photo collections

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Locate and remove unused directories. Organize file systems

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Rust-powered speed with multithreading. Process large drives quickly

features.title: Cli & Gui
features.description: Choose command-line or graphical interface. Flexible usage options

features.title: Cross
features.description: Works on Linux, Windows, and macOS. Universal compatibility
